title: Effectiveness Analysis and Utilization of Academic Library Information Retrieval Educational Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen academic information retrieval skills for supporting language-related research among working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify reliable materials related to their research topic with 80% accuracy using document-based search tools provided by the academic library.
Learners can reference and utilize provided instructional materials at a frequency of over 70% to resolve issues encountered during the information search process.
Learners can systematically improve their search strategies to secure target materials within three attempts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
